content:
Sure, here's an updated table of some of the major infrastructure projects currently under construction in India, along with their estimated costs:

| Project Name | Estimated Cost (in crores) | Status | Contractor(s) Involved |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mumbai-Ahmedabad High-Speed Rail (MAHSR) | 1,10,000 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, Afcons Infrastructure, JMC Projects, Tata Projects, Hitachi, Mitsubishi Electric |
| Western Dedicated Freight Corridor | 81,459 | Under Construction | Tata Projects, L&T, IRCON, Afcons Infrastructure |
| Delhi-Meerut Expressway | 8,346 | Under Construction | L&T, Apco Infratech, PNC Infratech, Ashoka Buildcon |
| Chennai Peripheral Ring Road | 10,000 | Under Construction | L&T, Ashoka Buildcon, Sadbhav Engineering |
| Navi Mumbai International Airport | 16,704 | Under Construction | GVK Group |
| Jewar International Airport, Noida | 29,560 | Under Construction | Yamuna International Airport Private Limited |
| Bengaluru Metro Rail Project Phase 2 | 30,695 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, Afcons Infrastructure, NCC, Simplex Infrastructures |
| Hyderabad Metro Rail Project Phase 2 | 18,000 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, NCC, JMC Projects, IL&FS Engineering, Tata Projects |
| Mumbai Coastal Road Project | 12,721 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, HCC, ITD Cementation |
| Mumbai Trans Harbour Link | 22,000 | Under Construction | L&T, Daewoo E&C, Tata Projects |
| Purvanchal Expressway, Uttar Pradesh | 22,500 | Under Construction | Apco Infratech, Gayatri Projects, Ashoka Buildcon |
| Eastern Dedicated Freight Corridor | 81,459 | Under Construction | L&T, Afcons Infrastructure, IRCON |
| Delhi-Ghaziabad-Meerut Regional Rapid Transit System | 30,274 | Under Construction | Alstom, Larsen & Toubro, Tata Projects |
| Delhi-Mumbai Expressway | 1,00,000 | Under Construction | L&T, Tata Projects, Dilip Buildcon |
| Vadodara-Mumbai Expressway | 90,000 | Under Construction | L&T, Dilip Buildcon, Afcons Infrastructure |
| Chennai Metro Rail Phase 2 | 61,843 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, Afcons Infrastructure, ITD Cementation |
| Ahmedabad Metro Rail Project Phase 2 | 7,600 | Under Construction | Tata Projects, J Kumar Infraprojects, NCC |
| Nagpur Metro Rail Project Phase 2 | 5,500 | Under Construction | L&T, NCC |
| Pune Metro Rail Project Phase 1 | 11,420 | Under Construction | Tata Projects, J Kumar Infraprojects, NCC |
| Kochi Metro Rail Project Phase 1B | 2,310 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, Alstom |
| Jaipur Metro Rail Project Phase 1B | 1,920 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, Tata Projects |
| Lucknow Metro Rail Project Phase 1B | 2,691 | Under Construction | Larsen & Toubro, Tata Projects |
| Guwahati Metro Rail Project | 22,000 | Under Construction | L&T, Tata Projects |
| Mumbai-Nagpur Expressway | 46,000 |  |  |
